releases.title: Descent
releases.description: Imagine decending into a dystopian megatropolis.  As you decend into the fog belowyou realize this is the home you didn't choose among the damned and the blessed. Lights of all the shades of heaven shine among this hellish city of mans own making.How many murders will there be tonight?  How many lovers will embrace.  Do you love this city or do you hate it?  Maybe it's both and maybe that is ok.

releases.title: Quasar
releases.description: Progressive House with elements of Trance and Tech, radiating energy like a quasar - one of the universe's most luminous objects powered by supermassive black holes. Just as quasars can outshine entire galaxies while being billions of light-years away, this track channels cosmic intensity through pulsing rhythms and stellar melodies.

releases.title: Arrival on Ganymede
releases.description: Progressive House track with a spacey vibe

releases.title: Contemplate
releases.description: Strange meditative pop with self made vocal chanting.
